title: "Putin speaks to AI version of himself in news conference"
excerpt: "Russian President Vladimir Putin was asked whether he has \"a lot of doubles\" by an AI version of himself during a marathon news conference. He was fielding questions from journalists and ordinary Russians in an hours-long annual news conference. The mayor of Kyiv says Russia has launched its biggest drone strike since the war began in 2022."
